cards.name: Rocky Helmet
text: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

cards.name: N
text: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws a card for each of his or her remaining Prize cards.
